<h3 id="X39747">X(39747) = ISOTOMIC CONJUGATE OF X(3995)</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; (a + b)*(a + c)*(a*b + b^2 - a*c + b*c)*(a*b - a*c - b*c - c^2) : :
